meta.name: description
meta.content: Northfield Public Schools is the district providing elementary, middle school, high school and community education to the Northfield, Minnesota area.
Northfield Public Schools is the district providing elementary, middle school, high school and community education to the Northfield, Minnesota area.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Northfield Public Schools is the district providing elementary, middle school, high school and community education to the Northfield, Minnesota area.

div.p: Por favor, elija traducir el sitio al español o visite esta página para obtener más recursos en español.

COVID-19 Updates | » Click here for updates and archived messages to families.
***School resumes via distance learning from March 31 through April 30, 2020.***

See the latest update message sent to families by clicking the link above.
Northfield Public Schools is committed to providing timely and accurate information about the District’s preparation and response to the global COVID-19 (coronavirus) pandemic.

source.track: Muted video of children getting off a school bus

a.aria-label: See how Northfield School reaches for excellence

div.class: column large-9 large-offset-2 medium-9 medium-offset-2 small-12
div.p: Northfield Public Schools empowers all learners to achieve their full potential.

At the elementary, middle and high school level, our curriculum challenges and engages students to get the most out of their education. Our strong Community Services program provides out-of-school activities for kids as well as learning opportunities for adults. Everyone on our team is dedicated to creating a positive environment that promotes learning.

div.class: row expanded collapse icon-links small-up-2 medium-up-4 large-up-8

a.h3: Distance Learning Update for Families No. 5 | April 16, 2020
Distance Learning Update for Families No. 4 | April 10, 2020
Distance Learning Update for Families No. 3 | April 7, 2020

div.p: There are many events occurring daily within the district. View listings by buildings or activity.

div.class: row large-up-2 medium-up-2 small-up-1 calendar-buttons district-calendar-buttons
row large-up-4 medium-up-2 small-up-2 large-collapse middle-collapse small-collapse calendar-buttons
row large-up-4 medium-up-2 small-up-2 large-collapse middle-collapse small-collapse calendar-buttons

div.address:
1400 Division Street South, Northfield, MN 55057
p 507.663.0600 / f 507.663.0611
Our Schools
